title: Emerald Cascade Jhumka - Pancharatna Sobha (Five Gemstone Radiance)
materials: adorned with meticulously placed Zirconia gemstones and vibrant Emeralds. Features a flawless Hyderabadi Polish for an enduring
features: Intricate filigree design reminiscent of traditional South Indian patterns. Features a combination of square, teardrop and round emerald gemstones and zirconia, set in a delicate and ornate frame that allows the gemstones to capture and reflect light beautifully. The cascading emerald accents adds an elegant touch.
colors: and lush Green (Emeralds) create a captivating contrast and a touch of royalty.
occasions: and grand celebrations. A statement piece for any special event or a dazzling modern party.
description: This Jhumka is a harmonious blend of traditional South Indian artistry and contemporary design. The carefully selected Emeralds radiate prosperity and renewal, while the Hyderabadi Polish ensures a long-lasting shine. A true heirloom piece that will be treasured for generations.
